reviewText:
I was most disappointed when I received this item. It was made and or copied in Korea, the presentation of the discs was very cheap and a number of them would not play. Further, if you are collecting classic movies like these the product really needs to be much better.
I would certainly not recommend this listing to anyone
Some were in b &w, not color.
I loved Elizabeth Taylor - so much that I got this collection -- for my neighbor... who adore's her.. a 10 out of 10 for these movies- collection. thanks again...
Love the movies, hate the Korea subtitles. Thank God I was able to turn the subtitles off.
This is a wonderful Elizabeth Taylor movie collection. It has most of her best movies. I am glad I found this set. You can enjoy the movies over and over again.  This is also a great gift.
My only gripe was the quality of Last Time I Saw Paris...some weird Korean knockoff but all the real classic films were top notch.
Middling review due to the wide swing in quality of the transfers, though the majority were very good. The lady herself was always beautiful.
I liked the collection a lot better once I learned to turn off all the subtitles. I have enjoyed watching them.
